label: 山水
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (One of the two types of recluse poetry). The pioneer of this genre is traditionally though to be Xie Lingyun.  The poet is a hermit, and his cell is hidden in the depths of nature.  The setting of the poem is uncultivated, not a pastoral scenery but real wilderness, its atmosphere is mystical rather than political.  [See also tianyuan (田園）] [Ch. shanshui, J. sansui or senzui] [謝靈運]
